content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(-40.5, 40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position -40.5, 40.5) 

### Boiler system at position(1.5, 1.0)
Consists of two boilers (position 1.5, 1.0 and position 1.5, 3.0) connected by pipes, and small electric poles at positions (3.5, 0.5) and (3.5, 2.5)

### Offshore pump system at position(-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of offshore pumps at positions (-7.5, 25.5), (-18.5, 27.5), (-16.5, 26.5), (-13.5, 26.5), (-3.5, 27.5), (-1.5, 28.5), and (0.5, 30.5) connected by pipes

### Pipe network at fluid system 620151
Consists of pipes connecting various entities including offshore pumps and boilers

### Pipe network at fluid system 620256
Consists of pipes connecting offshore pump at position (-16.5, 26.5) to other entities

### Pipe network at fluid system 620258
Consists of pipes connecting offshore pump at position (-13.5, 26.5) to other entities

### Pipe network at fluid system 620265
Consists of pipes connecting offshore pump at position (-18.5, 27.5) to other entities

### Electricity network
Consists of small electric poles at various positions, including (7.5, 0.5), (17.5, 1.5), (3.5, 2.5), (-14.5, 15.5), (-42.5, 39.5), and (-39.5, 34.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities in water
- Ensure the target position is not in water before attempting to place an entity
- Check the entity's footprint to ensure it does not overlap with water
- Try a different location if the entity cannot be placed at the desired position

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected
- Check the connection points of the entities to ensure they are correctly aligned
- Verify that the entities are not already connected to other entities in a way that prevents the desired connection

### Errors when working with pipes
- Ensure the pipes are correctly connected to the desired entities
- Verify that the pipes are not blocked or obstructed by other entities
- Check the fluid system and fluid box of the pipes to ensure they are correctly configured

### Errors when working with offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pumps are correctly connected to the pipe network
- Verify that the offshore pumps are not blocked or obstructed by other entities
- Check the fluid system and fluid box of the offshore pumps to ensure they are correctly configured

### Errors when working with boilers
- Ensure the boilers are correctly connected to the pipe network
- Verify that the boilers are not blocked or obstructed by other entities
- Check the fluid system and fluid box of the boilers to ensure they are correctly configured

### Errors when working with steam engines
- Ensure the steam engines are correctly connected to the power network
- Verify that the steam engines are not blocked or obstructed by other entities
- Check the fluid system and fluid box of the steam engines to ensure they are correctly configured
